CustomField.formula:
IF($Organization.Id = '00D3H0000000ivA', "https://aspect.co.uk/forms/outstanding-balance/", "https://aspect.co.uk.hyv.gotest.it/forms/outstanding-balance/") &"?cli="& Customer_first_name__c &"%20"&Customer_last_name__c &"&ref=" &TEXT(Visit_Completion_Report_Number__c) &"&id="& Id &"&cem="& Customer_email__c &
"&a="& TEXT(MOD( FLOOR(Fixed_total_charge_incl_VAT__c),8)) & "&b="& TEXT(MOD( FLOOR(Fixed_total_charge_incl_VAT__c/8),8)) & "&c="& TEXT(MOD( FLOOR(Fixed_total_charge_incl_VAT__c/(8*8)),8)) & "&d="& TEXT(MOD( FLOOR(Fixed_total_charge_incl_VAT__c/(8*8*8)),8)) & "&e="& TEXT(MOD( FLOOR(Fixed_total_charge_incl_VAT__c/(8*8*8*8)),8)) & "&f="& TEXT(MOD( FLOOR(Fixed_total_charge_incl_VAT__c/(8*8*8*8*8)),8)) &
"&x="& TEXT(MOD( MOD(Fixed_total_charge_incl_VAT__c,1)*100,8)) & "&y="& TEXT(MOD( FLOOR(MOD(Fixed_total_charge_incl_VAT__c,1)*100/8),8)) & "&z="& TEXT(MOD( FLOOR(MOD(Fixed_total_charge_incl_VAT__c,1)*100/(8*8)),8))
CustomField.label: Payment URL
